data.title: Robert James Stroud (1882-1973)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for James Stroud born 1882 Snodland, Kent, England died 1973 Haslemere, Surrey, England including ancestors + descendants + 5 photos + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.

1 Biography

2.1 Footnotes

Biography

Robert was the first born son of Elizabeth Oliver and James Stroud.

About 1910 he and one of his brothers travelled to Haslemere, Surrey, where they found work as brick layers and general laborourers. During this time he met and courted my grandmother, Francis Withall.

He married Frances Withall in 1912 at St Bartholmews Parish Church at Haslemere. Witnesses to their wedding were John and Clara Withall. In 1915 a daughter Annie Elizabeth was born.

Robert served in the Navy during WWI on the ship HRH Princess Royal. On October 26 1915 he was appointed temporary Sub-Lieutenant.

Robert was a quiet unassuming man and known to be very clever with his hands.

Robert James Stroud died age 88 at Haslemere, Surrey.
